original_text: As soon then as they were come to land, they saw a fire of coals there, and fish laid thereon, and bread.
korean_text: 육지에 올라보니 숯불이 있는데 그 위에 생선이 놓였고 떡도 있더라

sentences.original_text: As soon then as they were come to land
they saw a fire of coals there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그곳에 숯불이 있는 것을 보았고
